## 526. SHIRT
### Definition
An article of clothing that is worn on the upper part of the body, that has long sleeves that cover the arms and buttons. (Concepticon, mod.)

### Contexts
1. Женщины носят платья, мужчины — рубашки. 2. Одежда мужчины — рубашка и штаны. 1. Women wear dresses, men wear shirts. 2. Men’s clothing are shirt and trousers.
